verses.name: Esther 9:5
verses.text: Thus the Jews smote all their enemies with the stroke of the sword, and slaughter, and destruction, and did what they would unto those that hated them.

verses.name: Esther 9:6
verses.text: And in Shushan the palace the Jews slew and destroyed five hundred men.

verses.name: Esther 9:7
verses.text: And Parshandatha, and Dalphon, and Aspatha,

verses.name: Esther 9:8
verses.text: And Poratha, and Adalia, and Aridatha,

verses.name: Esther 9:9
verses.text: And Parmashta, and Arisai, and Aridai, and Vajezatha,

verses.name: Esther 9:10
verses.text: The ten sons of Haman the son of Hammedatha, the enemy of the Jews, slew they; but on the spoil laid they not their hand.
